summary: This mod adds a weapon similar to the Excalibur is the Zodiac weapon of FFXIV ARealm Reborn.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/AJ2Y04V.png[/img]
Sorry,I am not good at English.
This is a machine translation.

####About this mod####
This mod adds a weapon similar to the Excalibur is the Zodiac weapon of FFXIV ARealm Reborn .
How to obtain the items should be available on the ID that came out in the " Help xxx " from the console screen

■Excalibur
Use the power to be added to the equipment , during the 180 seconds once a day , the wave of light will shoot in a power attack

■Aegis Shield
If the block, you will be a barrier to 180 points disable the magic .

■Version Information
Ver 2.0
・Both hands sword version Delete
・Delete an item from a location
・Add the Aegis Shield

Ver 2.1
・Modification of strengthening set of weapons and shield
